snippet.title: Promise Mascot Agency | Launch Trailer | Available Now!
snippet.description:
LISTEN UP DREAMERS! PROMISE MASCOT AGENCY IS OUT NOW 📢📢📢📢

🎉You heard us right! TODAY IS THE DAY!  Promise Mascot Agency is AVAILABLE NOW on Steam, Epic, PS5, Xbox and Switch! 🎉

The gates to the quite probably, most definitely cursed town of Kaso-Machi are FINALLY open!  Play as former yakuza Michi and assistant manager Pinky☆ in an EPIC quest to restore glory to the town’s defunct mascot agency!  Be the boss, earn some cold hard cash, make dreams come true, and recruit a killer roster of sentient mascots in this open-world, genre bending, creature collector RPG! 

✨ Scarecrow super sentai! Severed pinkies! A Very Innocent Cat!  All this and more await you!  So what are you waiting for!  Grab your copy of Promise Mascot Agency NOW! ✨

Thanks as always for your support and being rad!
With much love, 
Pinky☆, Michi and the mascots!  🛻✨💗

🖤 Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2585830/Promise_Mascot_Agency/
🤍 Epic Game Store: https://store.epicgames.com/p/promise-mascot-agency-dd7a9c
💙 PlayStation Store: https://store.playstation.com/en-gb/concept/10008195
💚 Xbox: https://www.microsoft.com/store/productid/9p6gcj303k9b
❤️ Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/en-gb/Games/Nintendo-Switch-download-software/Promise-Mascot-Agency-2769305.html

⛩️ About Promise Mascot Agency ⛩️
From the creators of Paradise Killer comes an open world, mascot management, crime drama!
Be the boss. Turn a profit. Recruit and manage a chaotic roster of magnificent mascots!
Jump in your truck, and freely explore a forgotten (and cursed) Japanese town, where adventure awaits at every turn! Solve the mystery of your exile, unravel a wild conspiracy, and meet a host of truly eccentric characters along the way!

Follow Kaizen Game Works 💗
Website: https://kaizengameworks.com
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@kaizengameworks 
Promise Mascot Agency Reddit https://www.reddit.com/r/PromiseMascotAgency/
X / Twitter: https://x.com/KaizenGameWorks  
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/KaizenGameWorks 
Bluesky: https://bsky.app/profile/kaizengameworks.com

#promisemascotagency #プロミスマスコットエージェンシー #yakuza #mascots #yakuzagame #indiegame #indiegames #game #newgames
